text: @NYGovCuomo Um. Is this supposed to be you? Because YOU were the one who said the flu was much more of a threat to New Yorkers than #COVID19 just weeks before it ravaged through your State. You're a partisan hack who caused unimaginable amounts of death due to your incompetence. #KillerCuomo https://t.co/DUOOYfU83W
